attributes.action: Allow regular testing PCR results to be used for ''Fit to fly''.
attributes.additional_details: If the government encourages regular testing and have the capacity to provide such tests for free they should allow their citizens to use the regular testing scheme to allow for results to be used as the ''fit to fly''. Holidays are already at an all time high with the amount of procedures in place ie; Pre testing, Quarantine, tests on arrival, tests coming back, tests when back. it's almost to achieve a holiday.
attributes.background: Regular testing is the same test type of test as the ''fit to fly'' test but with a payment scheme. The goal of the petition is to allow the results from the regular test to be used for ''fit to fly'' providing they fall into the 48 hours time-frame.
